variable.name: SkinSettingsDescriptionVar
variable.value: This script is [COLOR FF007ACD]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED[/COLOR][CR]Some recommended scripts may be unsuitable for low performance devices

variable.name: CustomColorsDescriptionVar
variable.value: Set the Main Theme color used throughout the skin[CR]-- Can be overriden in some sections --
Set the Highlight Bar color used throughout the skin[CR]-- Will override the General Theme color --
Set to add color to the UnWatched Episode count[CR]-- Can be overriden in some sections --
Set the Main Menu Theme color[CR]-- Will override the General Theme color --
